title: AAQ: Is Consciousness a Sign of the Soul or the Mind? | His Grace Madhu Pandit Dasa
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.key_quote: These two statements look like contradictory.
segments.summary: The speaker introduces the topic of whether consciousness is a symptom of the soul or the mind, noting apparent contradictions in Prabhupada's statements.
segments.transcript: Bhagavad Gita 13.6.7. Symptoms of life also consist of the field of activity, and in the purport to this verse, Prabhupada writes, "The living symptoms represented by the consciousness and conviction are two manifestations of this subtle body, mind, ego, and intelligence." But doubt comes when we go further in this chapter. Prabhupada writes, "Consciousness as a symptom of the soul." These two statements look contradictory.
